summary: A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.
cast: Maxime Giffard|Michael Bailey Smith|Tom Bower|Ted Levine|Kathleen Quinlan|Dan Byrd|Emilie de Ravin|Aaron Stanford|Vinessa Shaw|Maisie Camilleri Preziosi|Robert Joy|Laura Ortiz|Ezra Buzzington|Billy Drago|Greg Nicotero|Ivana Turchetto|Desmond Askew|Judith Jane Vallette|Adam Perrell
title: Las colinas tienen ojos
